Posts.Content: Sometimes the radiologist who saw you that day wants another radiologist to look at your films for another opinion, and the other radiologist was not available at the time you were there. It should not take more than 2-3 days so as others say --keep calling & asking questions! Wish you the best of luck.My lump when I was your age was not cancer - I am now 61 & have just been diagnosed with cancer, surgery is next week. middlec
Posts.Title: kinda silly question
